summary: Please send buff Pokémon fan art
body:
Please send buff Pokémon fan art

Can people send me pictures of Pokémon with a bunch of muscles. Like, any Pokémon it could be a a buff ass pidgey. Please and thank you. I need to see this

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Reunette Reuniclus and Banette fusion Ghost/Psychic type Ability: Cursed Body Stats: HP - 88, Atk - 120, Def - 85, SpA - 120,...
caption:
Reunette

Reuniclus and Banette fusion

Ghost/Psychic type

Ability: Cursed Body

Stats: HP - 88, Atk - 120, Def - 85, SpA - 120, SpD - 85, Spe - 75

The Revenge Pokemon

Once a ruined Reuniclus doll, it now collects sewing equipment to stitch itself back together.  It wishes to end the life of children who it may come across, fearing that they will chuck it away like its previous owner. It uses its ghostly aura to pick up buttons and other decorations from bins to make itself more appealing to young children. It secretly wants to be loved and will spare the life of the child who owns it if it feels that it has been loved.

Request for anon.  I hope you like it. I spend way too long on this one.  I basically drew the whole thing and I love this little doll of Satan. I love this too much.  It’s cute in a strange way.

My background was too small for this and so I decided to make it a white background.  Also put the two pokemon that I’ve fused in the corner.  I’m just trying it out.

Also, this is the thing that I’ve drawn.  Image will be posted tomorrow.

blog.name: lgbt-pokemon
blog.title: all Pokemon are gay and trans
blog.description:
Requests are currently open! icon is our mascot, McMuffins, and he was drawn by @trriton! mods are Admin Pikachu, Mod Bulbasaur and Mod Mudkip.
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
This is an LGBT blog for Pokémon fans and Pokemonkin run by Pokémon fans! Send in headcanons, icon requests, stimboard requests, moodboard requests or requests for name + pronoun validation! Feel free to tag any post as kin/me/ID/etc unless specified otherwise!
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆ banned subjects post: https://lgbt-pokemon.tumblr.com/post/174667272261/im-going-to-go-ahead-and-make-a-list-of-moodboard
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
rules post: https://lgbt-pokemon.tumblr.com/post/175115955846/rules-read-before-requesting
☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆☆
We don't do MOGAI requests, nor do we do hetero/cis/polyamory/sapio requests.

title: Kecleon - 352
body:
It changes its shading to match its surroundings so it can sneak up on prey. Only its belly patterns stay fixed.

- Pokemon HeartGold, SoulSilver, Y

summary:
I made these three for a friend. They are based on styles.

Neigeon 

[Neige (French for snow) + eon]

Ghost /...
caption:
I made these three for a friend. They are based on styles.

Neigeon 

[Neige (French for snow) + eon]

Ghost / Ice

Feueon 

[Feu (French for fire) + eon]

Fire / Ghost

Bijoueon 

[Bijou (French for Jewel) + eon]

Rock / Ghost

Bijoueon evolves from Eevee when given a Hard Stone and leveled up in a Graveyard. 

Special Ability : Jewel Glow :
Bijoueon becomes a Rock / Dark type. It draws in crystal orbs, the orbs take 33% of the damage from super effective moves for 3 turns, one orb disappears each turn. To activate the Special Ability, Bijoueon must be holding the item Glow Orb.

summary:
Kaieon

[Kai (Japanese for Ocean & Worth) + eon]

Dark / Water

Kaieon evolves from Eevee when Eevee is given a Dark Jewel and...
caption:
Kaieon

[Kai (Japanese for Ocean & Worth) + eon]

Dark / Water

Kaieon evolves from Eevee when Eevee is given a Dark Jewel and then using a Water Stone on it.

Kaieons are often used to guard ship yards from wild Pokemon. They are usually put on a long chain attached at the leg, since they can not wear collars.

I made this eon for my friend. It only took me two hours of work in GIMP.
